title: What are these rankings?
text: This is the Extended Stats game rankings. One of the objectives of Extended Stats is to experiment with being different to BGG, and this page does indeed use a different ranking system. You can sort by BGG Ranking if that offends you.
If you have a good idea for another ranking, let me know and I can try to add it to this table.

title: Score
text: A game's score is simply all of the ratings Extended Stats users have given it, added up. People complain 'but that favours common games!' Well, yes, those games got commn for a reason.

title: Ratings Count
text: How many Extended Stats users have rated the game.

title: Normalised Ranking
text: This column is not working yet. After I reimplement it I'll remember what it means.

title: Total Plays
text: Total plays of this game recorded by Extended Stats users.

title: H-index
text: The largest number h such that h players have played the game h times each.

title: G-index
text: The largest number g such that the g players who have played the game the most times have played the game on average g times each. This is similar to the h-index but favours games that some people play alot.
